about_the_game:
This Sample Version of Freedom Planet 2 lets you blast through the Dragon Valley stage as any character. After you try everyone out, you can experiment with different difficulty levels and item combinations and shoot for the fastest time record!

Features

  • Four playable characters each with her own unique fighting style: Lilac the Dragon Girl (Speed Type), Carol the Wildcat (Brawler Type), Milla the Hound (Explorer Type), and Neera the Frost Knight (Power Type).
  • Parry enemy attacks with the new Guard button. If timing's not your thing, an Auto Guard item exists in the game that makes your character automatically guard against attacks if possible.
  • A new Revival system gives you a chance to clinch victory during very close battles. Use it wisely - it costs a stock and one more hit will knock you out again!
  • 12 sample items to choose from. The Sample Version contains 3 preset item combinations as well as a fourth setting for custom loadouts. Amulets and Charms provide helpful effects, while Brave Stones make combat harder in exchange for bonus crystals.
